query.sql: select oifm.section_id as o_sec_id, oit.item_id as o_item_id, oig.oc_oid as o_ig_oid, oig.name as o_ig_name, oigm.repeating_group as o_repeating, difm.section_id as d_sec_id, difm.item_id as d_item_id, dig.oc_oid as d_ig_oid, dig.name as d_ig_name, digm.repeating_group as d_repeating, difm.item_form_metadata_id as d_ifm_id, trim((substring(rs.options_values, position(',' in rs.options_values)+1, (position(')' in rs.options_values)-position(',' in rs.options_values)-1) ))) as option_name from response_set rs join item oit on oit.name = trim((substring(rs.options_values, position('(' in rs.options_values)+1, (position(',' in rs.options_values) - position('(' in rs.options_values)-1)))), item_form_metadata difm, item_group_metadata digm, item_group dig, item_form_metadata oifm, item_group_metadata oigm, item_group oig where difm.crf_version_id = ? and rs.version_id = ? and rs.response_type_id = 10 and difm.response_set_id = rs.response_set_id and oifm.crf_version_id = ? and oifm.item_id = oit.item_id and digm.crf_version_id = ? and digm.item_id = difm.item_id and dig.item_group_id = digm.item_group_id and oigm.crf_version_id = ? and oigm.item_id = oit.item_id and oig.item_group_id = oigm.item_group_id order by oifm.section_id, oifm.item_id
